actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt bonds for solid waste disposal facilities from the volume limitation on the issuance of private activity bonds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt bonds for solid waste disposal facilities from the volume limitation on the issuance of tax-exempt private activity bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt bonds for solid waste disposal facilities from the volume limitation on the issuance of private activity bonds.
